channel.title: [Delta] 317 Npc Placement
channel.description:
All of the npc's on my server (delta based) Are and spawn facing south, how can I make them face north, east, or west?
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/1zq6ijk.jpg[/img]
Any help please?.. I'm sure its simple, but its just too simple to notice for my 13 year old curriculum
